name: Yasmeen
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Assalamualaikum Yasmeen, Happy Birthday to you üéÇ‚ù§Ô∏è.  Mnje mlm ki tumna aa din bahut khaas hata , tumna kitta khaas ki mnje b utta khaas aa din.Mujhe pata he ki tume merese bahut dhoor hee but tume mere Dil ku kabbi nazdeek ichh hati Yasmeen. Actual me tume mere life me kab enter hue ki jab my itna socha nitha ki tume mere Dil ku utta close hoti kako but aa b achach lo. On this special day I just want to thankyou for being in my life.You deserve every bit of happiness,love and success and I'll always be here for u Yasmeen.Tumna my khushi se dekna kaleta hu. Normal se birthday jyada karleteni kate ,Tume karlende ni karlende aa din tho bahut Khushi se hana tume khali aa ek din   ichh ni zindagi bhar b. Just oo tention lena chhodo exams ka tume success easy se achieve karti oo ek stress leeyenitho.I know u r very talented.Life me tume kya chahte hi ki oo tumna easy se miltha .stay blessed always.Just go out with friends,chill and create memories and don't forget to take pictures üòÖ.Once again happy birthday to you. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
